short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension turns tab url into Qr code.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Is it hard to enter url at address bar  into somewhere in smartphone ? Don't you want to use your smartphone boring keypad slowly?
 If yes ,
Click Qrify icon.And read qr code with your smarthphone qr code reader.
Make qr code of url instantly.
